startingPosition.instruction: Sit with the legs outstretched in front. Feet together. Hands besides the buttocks. Spine Straight. Imagine that there is a rope hanging in front of the body.

technique.instruction: Inhaling reach up with the right hand to grasp the rope at a higher point, keep the elbow staright and looking upward.
Exhaling pull the right arm down, putting power into it as though pulling the rope downwards and eyes follow the downward movement of the hand.
Inhaling reach up with the left hand to grasp the rope at a higher point, keep the elbow staright and eyes follow the upward movement of the hand.
Exhaling pull the left arm down, putting power into it as though pulling the rope downwards and eyes follow the downward movement of the hand.

info: Both arms do not move at the same time.
Deep breathing should be done and movement should be in sync with the breathing.
